Articles.Content:
> 
> [Meanwhile, on the vessel]
> Storage download terminated. Beginning raw bit extraction... Download 83% complete.

But the computer is fried

Saren?

EDI: On it... Engaging...Engines destroyed...we have tractored them.
Shall I activate Operation Sentience?
smashes the shuttle computer...
[Raw bit extraction takes the bits of data as a pseudo-physical form]

> 
> Shall I activate Operation Sentience?

no, not yet...
We need to activate operation Sentience before we're overwhelmed!
EDI, dock the ship, see if you can't track from where the downloads are being made. \*let's cut this download off NOW

[Meanwhile, on the Mun]

Hey, Jeb. What's that?

(Half destroyed transport crashes on Jeb and Bill's lander)

![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> EDI, dock the ship, see if you can't track from where the downloads are being made. \*let's cut this download off NOW

I'm activating a MSP (magnetic signal pulse). it should wipe the download.

Computer, download status.

99.5% completed. Estimated 7 seconds left.

Oh, sir. If I may say something...
Shoot...

Uhh... What happened? Where am I? Status repo---

(passes out again)
I'm gonna detonate the Kinemet in the Citadel's hull!

"I'm the REAL engineer!"

**Xannari's vessel decloaks, herself aboard**

Oh, did I get you? I totally got you good.

Well, I've got to leave now. Computer, Gigahelix Factor 1, please.
Kaboom! (Station disintegrates as everyone is beamed aboard the Discovery)

> 
> I'm gonna detonate the Kinemet in the Citadel's hull!

Negative, you blow that thing, and you kill every delegate on this station! Ourselves included!

But that'll kill every-----!

(passes out again and falls out of bed)

Throw Xannari in the stasis tube!

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Negative, you blow that thing, and you kill every delegate on this station! Ourselves included!

I beamed everyone aboard the Discovery!
Saren, change of plan, track Xannari's ship, silent running! do not engage, REPEAT, DO NOT ENGAGE!

**Back at base**

Well, that was fun. Let's review the data.

100%! Awesome. Defenses, armaments, the whole 9!

**Intently reviews data thoroughly...**Ã¢â‚¬â€¹

[Those are some pretty powerful sensors if they can track objects more than a gigaparsec away!]
turns to Laythe: Laythe, I am completely livid by what you had just done!
The station is gone. I'm pursuing Xannari in the Discovery, which is full of Delegates. I'm beaming the delegates to Laythe so they can party.

What's going on? what's Xannari Doing? Wha-

(Passes out and reopens wound in back.
But no one died!
forget it, right now, we need to focus on getting Junior well, the last thing we need right now is more combat.
